did.unittitle: Horse drawn fire engine in front of station with firefighters and police chief in Lebanon, Kentucky

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Left to Right - #2 J. W. Miller, Harry S. Stoy, Edgar Bowman, Bert Hilpp (standing), John McKenna, ___ Hamilton, Will Canary, Ivo Canary (Fire Chief), Will Beckett, J. Ark Thompson, Chief of Police
